Texts.Chs: 一个鲛人，嗯？
Texts.Eng: A Hylotl, eh?

Texts.Chs: 一个猴子！哦等一下，猴子是有尾巴的...这是一个猿人！
Texts.Eng: A monkey! Oh wait, monkeys have tails. An ape!

Texts.Chs: 一个正在说话的猴子。真酷。
Texts.Eng: A talking monkey. Cool.

Texts.Chs: 啊啊啊啊啊！
Texts.Eng: Aaaaghhhh!!

Texts.Chs: 啊！噢，抱歉......我对大猩猩有着说不说原因的恐惧，而且你的脸......额......真的抱歉......
Texts.Eng: Aah!!! Oh, sorry - I have an irrational fear of chimpanzees, and your face... er... Sorry...

Texts.Chs: 冠军来了。
Texts.Eng: Ace meeting you.

Texts.Chs: 伙计，没事吧？
Texts.Eng: Alright mate?

Texts.Chs: 很好，我得到了情报。我将要出发了。
Texts.Eng: Alright, I get the message.  I'm gone.

Texts.Chs: 没事吧？
Texts.Eng: Alright?

Texts.Chs: 我所遇到的另一个翼族人告诉了我水晶塔的相关事情。让人心寒。
Texts.Eng: Another Avian I met told me about the Celestial Towers. Chilling.

Texts.Chs: 今天发生了什么趣事吗？
Texts.Eng: Anything interesting happening today?

Texts.Chs: 猿人是不是都擅长科学？这是我在学校学的最糟糕的一门课程了。
Texts.Eng: Are all Apex good at science? It was my worst subject at school.

Texts.Chs: 猿人真的在持续退化吗？你什么时候会长出尾巴呢？
Texts.Eng: Are the Apex continuously devolving? When do you get tails?

Texts.Chs: 你是打算伤害我吗？
Texts.Eng: Are you gonna hurt me?

Texts.Chs: 你的身体是不是由纯粹能量组成的？
Texts.Eng: Are you made of pure energy?

Texts.Chs: 翼族人很酷。
Texts.Eng: Avians are SO COOL!

Texts.Chs: 遇见你真棒，猿人！
Texts.Eng: Awesome to see you, Apex!

Texts.Chs: 变成一个史莱姆真的改变了我对那些黏液的看法。
Texts.Eng: Becoming a slime really changed my opinion of those little slimes.

Texts.Chs: 如果我带一片羽毛来，我能不能制造一支羽毛笔？
Texts.Eng: Can I borrow a feather to make a quill?

Texts.Chs: 你能浸一下水吗？
Texts.Eng: Can you go in the water?

Texts.Chs: 你能把东西放回原来位置吗？
Texts.Eng: Can you put things back the way they were?

Texts.Chs: 你能读一下？
Texts.Eng: Can you read?

Texts.Chs: 你就不能让这些东西恢复原样吗？
Texts.Eng: Can't you just fix things back to normal?

Texts.Chs: 能不能扫描这件物品，或者复制一份，而不是直接拿走它？
Texts.Eng: Can't you just scan and replicate that or something instead of taking it?

Texts.Chs: 快一点，<entityname>。我真的受不了了。
Texts.Eng: Come on, <entityname>.  I can't live like this.

Texts.Chs: 你能打败一只鲨鱼吗？这就像是在问我能否打败一只猛虎一样。
Texts.Eng: Could you beat a shark in a fight? Maybe that's like asking if I could beat a tiger in a fight.

Texts.Chs: 你能为我补上那个洞口吗？
Texts.Eng: Could you patch that hole for me?

Texts.Chs: 如果有时间的话，你能不泵教我如何狩猎？
Texts.Eng: Could you teach me how to hunt some time?

Texts.Chs: 听得到我们的星球的声音吗，电子人？我们现在该做什么？
Texts.Eng: Did you hear about our planet, Glitch? What do we do now?

Texts.Chs: 你需要我在身边吗？
Texts.Eng: Did you need me?

Texts.Chs: 这些猿人曾与我们相似，不是吗？额...我是在说人类。
Texts.Eng: Didn't the Apex look kind of like us once?  Oh, uh... I mean like humans?

Texts.Chs: 叶族人有没有被巨型的蜂鸟袭击过？
Texts.Eng: Do Floran ever get attacked by giant hummingbirds?

Texts.Chs: 有没有叶族人长到250英尺高，像一棵有脸的红杉？
Texts.Eng: Do Floran ever get like 250ft tall, like a sequoia tree with a face?

Texts.Chs: 鲛人有没有干透过？
Texts.Eng: Do Hylotl ever dry out?

Texts.Chs: 你们在过去有没有迫不得要已换掉眼球的时候？
Texts.Eng: Do you ever have to replace your eye bulbs?

Texts.Chs: 你们是一直发光，还是像开关一样可以开关自如？
Texts.Eng: Do you glow all the time, or is it like a switch you can turn off?

Texts.Chs: 你们这些家伙身上有没有花粉？
Texts.Eng: Do you guys have pollen?

Texts.Chs: 你们有眼睛吗？没有的话，你们又是如何观察周围事物的呢？
Texts.Eng: Do you have eyes? How do you even see?

Texts.Chs: 你们的光会在晚上的时候吸引虫子吗，我捉一点虫子...
Texts.Eng: Does your glow attract bugs at night? I collect bugs...

Texts.Chs: 想都别想。我们的身体是有毒的。
Texts.Eng: Don't even think about it.  Our bodies are toxic.

Texts.Chs: 别担心，触摸我们不会腐蚀你的手指或任何东西。
Texts.Eng: Don't worry, touching us won't corrode your fingers or anything.

Texts.Chs: 别担心，我们不算太粘。你的羽毛很安全。
Texts.Eng: Don't worry, we're not too sticky.  Your feathers are safe.

Texts.Chs: 每次我看到一个正常人，我都会有点担心他们可能粗鲁失礼。
Texts.Eng: Every time I see a regular human, I get a little worried that they might be rude.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人天下第一！
Texts.Eng: Florans are the best!

Texts.Chs: Geez...
Texts.Eng: Geez...

Texts.Chs: 冲冲冲！
Texts.Eng: Go go go!

Texts.Chs: 见到你很高兴。
Texts.Eng: Good to see you.

Texts.Chs: 很高兴遇见你，pal。
Texts.Eng: Great to see you, pal.

Texts.Chs: 防御！！
Texts.Eng: Guards!!

Texts.Chs: 啊哈，哦我的天，你闻起来真有趣。
Texts.Eng: Hah, oh my, you smell funny.

Texts.Chs: 啊哈，我们都是黏糊糊的！
Texts.Eng: Hah, we're both slimy!

Texts.Chs: 你听说过“怪物博物馆”吗？
Texts.Eng: Have you ever heard of 'Monster Musume'?

Texts.Chs: 你有没有试过像人类一样剃毛发？
Texts.Eng: Have you ever tried shaving to pass as human?

Texts.Chs: 你尝过太阳花种子吗？我觉你你会喜欢的。
Texts.Eng: Have you ever tried sunflower seeds? I think you'd love them.

Texts.Chs: 你好！嗯，我希望这不是冒犯。
Texts.Eng: Hello! Uh, I hope that wasn't offensive.

Texts.Chs: 你好，粘液小子。
Texts.Eng: Hello, fellow slime.

Texts.Chs: 你好好好好。
Texts.Eng: Hellooo.

Texts.Chs: 救命！
Texts.Eng: Help!

Texts.Chs: 拿去吧，<entityname>。
Texts.Eng: Here you go, <entityname>.

Texts.Chs: 这里，我想拥有这个。
Texts.Eng: Here, I'd like you to have this.

Texts.Chs: 嘿这边，猿人！
Texts.Eng: Hey there, Apex!

Texts.Chs: 嘿这边，翼族人！
Texts.Eng: Hey there, Avian!

Texts.Chs: 嘿，欢迎！
Texts.Eng: Hey! Welcome!

Texts.Chs: 嘿。<entityname>，你需要什么吗？
Texts.Eng: Hey, <entityname>.  Did you need anything?

Texts.Chs: 嘿，猿人！
Texts.Eng: Hey, ape-dude!

Texts.Chs: 嘿，很高兴见到你。
Texts.Eng: Hey, great to see you.

Texts.Chs: 嘿，这是只大鸟！
Texts.Eng: Hey, it's a big bird!

Texts.Chs: 嘿，很高兴遇见你。0
Texts.Eng: Hey, nice to meet you.

Texts.Chs: 嘿，你在做什么？
Texts.Eng: Hey, what're you doing?

Texts.Chs: 嘿，发生什么了？
Texts.Eng: Hey, what's happening?

Texts.Chs: 嘿，怎么了？
Texts.Eng: Hey, what's up?

Texts.Chs: 嘿，你是团果冻？我也是！哈！
Texts.Eng: Hey, you jelly?  So am I!  Ha!

Texts.Chs: 你是怎么运作的？
Texts.Eng: How do you work?

Texts.Chs: 一切安好？
Texts.Eng: How're things?

Texts.Chs: 进展如何？
Texts.Eng: How's it going?

Texts.Chs: 怎么样？
Texts.Eng: How's it?

Texts.Chs: 生活对你怎么样？
Texts.Eng: How's life treating you?

Texts.Chs: 你好。
Texts.Eng: Howdy.

Texts.Chs: 鲛人艺术十分出色，我也是粉丝之一。
Texts.Eng: Hylotl art is pretty nice, I'm a fan.

Texts.Chs: 我打赌你就是派对上最亮的仔！
Texts.Eng: I bet you're popular at parties!

Texts.Chs: 我敢打赌，你杀的怪物比我吃的热饭还多。
Texts.Eng: I bet you've killed more monsters than I've had hot dinners.

Texts.Chs: 我没有读多少诗，我觉得它太晦涩了。
Texts.Eng: I don't read a lot of poetry, I find it too opaque.

Texts.Chs: 我想我从变异后就没病过一次。
Texts.Eng: I don't think I've been sick even once since I mutated.

Texts.Chs: 我还不想死！
Texts.Eng: I don't wanna die!

Texts.Chs: 我绘制了一点小作品，也许你想找个时间观摩观摩？
Texts.Eng: I draw a little, maybe you'd like to take a look sometime?

Texts.Chs: 我盯住你了，叶族人。
Texts.Eng: I got my eye on you, Floran.

Texts.Chs: 我吃过一块比萨饼，上面有金枪鱼和香蕉。出奇的不错。
Texts.Eng: I had a pizza with tuna and bananas on it once. Surprisingly good.

Texts.Chs: 我听说你们和鲛人无法和睦相处？
Texts.Eng: I hear you and the fish people don't get on?

Texts.Chs: 我听说你们的建筑巧夺天工。
Texts.Eng: I hear your architecture is stunning.

Texts.Chs: 我听说你们翼族建造了宏伟的寺庙。我们以前也这样做。
Texts.Eng: I hear your kind build grand temples. We used to do that too.

Texts.Chs: 我希望这不会经常发生。
Texts.Eng: I hope that doesn't happen too often.

Texts.Chs: 我希望就这样。
Texts.Eng: I hope this'll do.

Texts.Chs: 我希望你未来的租户得到更好的待遇。
Texts.Eng: I hope your future tenants are treated better than this.

Texts.Chs: 我喜欢软又湿。
Texts.Eng: I like being squishy.

Texts.Chs: 我喜欢鸟儿; 我叔叔曾经养过鹦鹉。
Texts.Eng: I like birds; my uncle used to own parrots.

Texts.Chs: 我喜欢这个地方以前的样子。
Texts.Eng: I liked this place the way it was before.

Texts.Chs: 我喜欢你说话的方式。
Texts.Eng: I love the way you guys talk.

Texts.Chs: 我曾经有一次遇到绿手指——是个很棒的人...或者是个女孩...或者两个都不是？
Texts.Eng: I met a greenfinger once - real nice guy... Or girl... Or neither?

Texts.Chs: 我想念凉爽的海风。
Texts.Eng: I miss the cool sea breeze.

Texts.Chs: 我曾用纸板做过电子人的服饰。
Texts.Eng: I once made a Glitch costume out of cardboard.

Texts.Chs: 我曾经看过其中一座翼族塔楼。翼族人会从那些塔上面跳下去！？
Texts.Eng: I saw one of those Avian towers once. People jump off those!?

Texts.Chs: 我还住在这里,你为什么又提出另一个契约？
Texts.Eng: I still live here.  Why'd you put up another deed?

Texts.Chs: 我研究星际宗教——克鲁西斯真是令人着迷。
Texts.Eng: I study intergalactic religions - Kluex is just fascinating.

Texts.Chs: 我想我还是继续游泳吧。
Texts.Eng: I think I'll pass on going for a swim.

Texts.Chs: 我也不会飞。
Texts.Eng: I too am flightless.

Texts.Chs: 我曾经是探险队的异种生物学家，但我不想伤害史莱姆。
Texts.Eng: I used to be expedition's xenobiologist, but I didn't want to hurt the slimes.

Texts.Chs: 我曾经住在地球上的海滩边。我好怀念。
Texts.Eng: I used to live by a beach on Earth. I miss it.

Texts.Chs: 我过去常常冥想，但我却不能忍受安静。
Texts.Eng: I used to meditate, but I couldn't stand the quiet.

Texts.Chs: 我以前在机器人实验室工作。
Texts.Eng: I used to work in a robotics lab.

Texts.Chs: 我想要和你一样的盔甲。
Texts.Eng: I want armour like yours.

Texts.Chs: 我想从事矛的生产，你认为这有市场吗？
Texts.Eng: I want to go into spear production, do you think there's a market for it?

Texts.Chs: 当我听说到发生在地球上的事情时，我还在史莱姆的世界里。
Texts.Eng: I was in the slime world when I heard what happened to Earth.

Texts.Chs: 我希望我上辈子是个叶族人。
Texts.Eng: I wish I was a Floran.

Texts.Chs: 我会帮忙的，但我没有武器！你能帮帮他们吗？！
Texts.Eng: I'd help, but I don't have a weapon!  Can you help them?!

Texts.Chs: 我觉得这里有一点草拟。
Texts.Eng: I'm feeling a bit of a draft here.

Texts.Chs: 我赶时间，得飞了。哎呀，对不起，那太麻木了。
Texts.Eng: I'm in a hurry, gotta fly. Oops, sorry, that was insensitive.

Texts.Chs: 我害怕你。
Texts.Eng: I'm scared of you.

Texts.Chs: 我一直想和机器人一起出去闲逛。
Texts.Eng: I've always wanted to hang out with a robot.

Texts.Chs: 打从我成为一名史莱姆以来，我遇到了一些关于水的问题，但我仍然是一个非常棒的游泳健将。
Texts.Eng: I've had some problems with water ever since I became a slimeperson, but I'm still a pretty good swimmer.

Texts.Chs: 我听说叶族人非常凶残，但你似乎挺和善的。
Texts.Eng: I've heard Floran can be pretty vicious, but you seem kinda nice.

Texts.Chs: 我听说过关于科技发展部的坏事，我并不对你加入守护团的行为感到惊讶。
Texts.Eng: I've heard bad things about the Miniknog, I'm not surprised you joined the Protectorate.

Texts.Chs: 我从来没有见过科技发展部的士兵。他们吓人吗？
Texts.Eng: I've never met a Miniknog soldier. Are they scary?

Texts.Chs: 我从来没有遇到过我不喜欢的翼族人。
Texts.Eng: I've never met an Avian I didn't like.

Texts.Chs: 我已经看了看了十本书！
Texts.Eng: I've read ten books!

Texts.Chs: 我读过的书中说你们叶族大部分人都是野蛮人。你似乎不是。
Texts.Eng: I've read that most of your kind are savages. You don't seem to be.

Texts.Chs: 如果一位翼族人和一只蛇有了一个孩子，它会是条羽毛围巾吗？
Texts.Eng: If an Avian and a snake had a baby, would it be a feather boa?

Texts.Chs: 如果有人带了武器，那就给我抄家伙！！
Texts.Eng: If anyone's got a weapon, take that thing out!!

Texts.Chs: 如果事态继续这样下去，我会前去别的地方。
Texts.Eng: If things stay in this state, I'm heading elsewhere.

Texts.Chs: 被事先告知这件事真是在好不过了。
Texts.Eng: It'd have been nice to be informed beforehand about this sorta thing.

Texts.Chs: 很难相信叶族人会是致命的杀手。
Texts.Eng: It's hard to believe Floran could be lethal killers.

Texts.Chs: 住在这里真好。这里比之前住的地方更加和平。
Texts.Eng: It's kinda nice living out here.  Much more peaceful.

Texts.Chs: 很高兴见到你！
Texts.Eng: It's pretty exciting to see you!

Texts.Chs: 你不能飞，这可真奇怪。
Texts.Eng: It's weird that you can't fly.

Texts.Chs: 大猿究竟有多大？
Texts.Eng: Just how big IS Big Ape?

Texts.Chs: 干掉它！干掉它！
Texts.Eng: KILL IT!!  KILL IT!!

Texts.Chs: 生活在水底下真酷，
Texts.Eng: Living under water is cool.

Texts.Chs: 我父亲是一名机械师，但我想对于电子人方面来说方面他会是一名医生。
Texts.Eng: My dad is a mechanic, but I guess in Glitch terms he's a doctor.

Texts.Chs: 多俊的脸。
Texts.Eng: Nice face.

Texts.Chs: 多漂亮的羽毛。
Texts.Eng: Nice feathers there.

Texts.Chs: 很高兴见到拟！
Texts.Eng: Nice meeting ya!

Texts.Chs: 不错的装备，你从哪儿搞到的？
Texts.Eng: Nice outfit, where'd you get it?

Texts.Chs: 很高兴见到你！
Texts.Eng: Nice to meet you!

Texts.Chs: 很高兴见到你，鱼脸人。
Texts.Eng: Nice to meet you, fishface.

Texts.Chs: 毫无疑问，机器人真是太帅了！
Texts.Eng: No bones about it, robots are just awesome.

Texts.Chs: 哦快点，阻止它！
Texts.Eng: Oh come on, stop it!

Texts.Chs: 哦天哪！，快来人帮忙！
Texts.Eng: Oh geez, somebody help!

Texts.Chs: 哦，嗯...你好。
Texts.Eng: Oh geez, uh... hello.

Texts.Chs: 哦，嘿！
Texts.Eng: Oh hey!

Texts.Chs: 哦，嘿，一条巨大的鱼。
Texts.Eng: Oh hey, a giant fish.

Texts.Chs: 哦，嘿，怎么样？
Texts.Eng: Oh hey, how's it going?

Texts.Chs: 哦，有人开枪，救命！
Texts.Eng: Oh shoot, HELP!!

Texts.Chs: 哦，哇，我以前从没见过像你这样的人！
Texts.Eng: Oh wow, I've never seen anyone like you before!

Texts.Chs: 哦，哇，你是由等离子构成的。
Texts.Eng: Oh wow, you're made of plasma.

Texts.Chs: 好吧，我之前还真没见过像你这样的人。
Texts.Eng: Okay, I've never seen anyone like you before.

Texts.Chs: 我们的星球曾有大片的海洋。直到后来一只触手怪出现了。
Texts.Eng: Our planet had many oceans. Then a tentacle monster happened.

Texts.Chs: 哇哦，我的眼睛，你真是亮爆了。
Texts.Eng: Ow, my eyes. You're super bright.

Texts.Chs: 拜托，救救他们！！
Texts.Eng: Please, help them!!

Texts.Chs: 很高兴认识你，猿人。
Texts.Eng: Pleasure to make your acquaintance, ape.

Texts.Chs: 请把东西放回去。
Texts.Eng: Put that back, please.

Texts.Chs: 暂时安全了！
Texts.Eng: Safe!  For the moment.

Texts.Chs: 海豹就像狗，在海里。所有的鲛人都应该有只海豹。
Texts.Eng: Seals are like dogs, but in the sea. All Hylotl should have seals.

Texts.Chs: 很高兴见到你，电子人！
Texts.Eng: So lovely to meet you, Glitch!

Texts.Chs: 有人吃过一次史莱姆果冻。后来他们的身体从里到外的融化了。
Texts.Eng: Some people tried eating slime jelly once.  Their bodies melted from the inside out.

Texts.Chs: 快来人来做点什么！
Texts.Eng: Somebody do something!

Texts.Chs: 我也不清楚为什么，你的某些东西让我想吃炸鱼薯条。
Texts.Eng: Something about you makes me want fish and chips. Can't put my finger on what.

Texts.Chs: 感觉事情有些不对劲。
Texts.Eng: Something doesn't feel right.

Texts.Chs: 有时候我喜欢假装自己是个个老练的骑士！
Texts.Eng: Sometimes I like to pretend I'm an old timey knight!

Texts.Chs: 对于猿人被极权压迫的事情我感到很难过。
Texts.Eng: Sorry that the Apex are all oppressed and stuff.

Texts.Chs: 不要再偷我的东西！
Texts.Eng: Stop stealing my stuff!

Texts.Chs: 突然想起我以前在我的旧异种生物学实验室工作的日子...
Texts.Eng: Suddenly remembering working in my old xenobiology lab...

Texts.Chs: 又活了一天。唷...
Texts.Eng: Survived another day.  Whew...

Texts.Chs: 带他们出去！
Texts.Eng: Take 'em out!

Texts.Chs: 会说话的鱼，有腿的鲨鱼...伙计，我喜欢太空！
Texts.Eng: Talking fish, sharks with legs... man, I love space!

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你！
Texts.Eng: Thank you!

Texts.Chs: 感谢你的光临！
Texts.Eng: Thanks for dropping by!

Texts.Chs: 你这身合金很不错。
Texts.Eng: That's a nice alloy you've got there.

Texts.Chs: 你这发光真是酷毙了。
Texts.Eng: That's a pretty cool glow you've got going there.

Texts.Chs: 就这样，我要离开这里。
Texts.Eng: That's it I'm outta here.

Texts.Chs: 电子人有一种有趣的谈话方式...尽管这避免了废话。
Texts.Eng: The Glitch have a funny way of talking... Cuts out the flim-flam though.

Texts.Chs: 鲛人们为和平而奋斗，对吧？ 就和人类一样。难怪你会是个守护者。
Texts.Eng: The Hylotl strive for peace, right? Same as humans. No wonder you're a Protector.

Texts.Chs: 科技发展部真是骇人听闻！
Texts.Eng: The Miniknog sounds terrible!

Texts.Chs: 这地方可以用上更好的防御体系。
Texts.Eng: This place could use a better defense setup.

Texts.Chs: 这个地方已经被占用了。
Texts.Eng: This place's already occupied.

Texts.Chs: 这地方风光不再。
Texts.Eng: This place's seen better days.

Texts.Chs: 这些可怜的猴子......啥？哦，嗯...没啥！
Texts.Eng: Those poor monkeys... ... what?  Oh, uh... nothing!

Texts.Chs: 我想是时候到别的地方去开店了。
Texts.Eng: Time to set up shop somewhere else, I guess.

Texts.Chs: 在发生这一切之后，我们决定让其他的史莱姆们保持平静。
Texts.Eng: We decided to leave the other slimes in peace after all that happened.

Texts.Chs: 我们应该更频繁地闲逛，鱼人。
Texts.Eng: We should hang out more often, fish.

Texts.Chs: 欢迎！
Texts.Eng: Welcome!

Texts.Chs: 欢迎，鲛人！
Texts.Eng: Welcome, Hylotl!

Texts.Chs: 好吧，你是我之前从来没见过的东西。
Texts.Eng: Well, you're something I've not seen before.

Texts.Chs: 你是啥？...不管你是啥，我还是喜欢你。
Texts.Eng: What are you? ...Whatever you are, I like it.

Texts.Chs: 你是用什么金属制成的？
Texts.Eng: What metal are you made from?

Texts.Chs: 你想做什么？
Texts.Eng: What you up to?

Texts.Chs: 你在做什么，<entityname>？
Texts.Eng: What're you doing, <entityname>?

Texts.Chs: 这里发生了什么？
Texts.Eng: What's going on here?

Texts.Chs: 由金属制成是种什么感觉？
Texts.Eng: What's it like to be made of metal?

Texts.Chs: 发生了什么，<entityname>？
Texts.Eng: What's up, <entityname>?

Texts.Chs: 发生了什么？
Texts.Eng: What's up?

Texts.Chs: 当我还是一个孩子的时候，我有一个看起来与你很相像的玩具猴子。
Texts.Eng: When I was a child I had a toy monkey that looked like you.

Texts.Chs: 当你需要警卫的时候，警卫他娘的在哪里？！
Texts.Eng: Where the heck's a guard when you need one?!

Texts.Chs: 当你需要工具箱的时候它在哪里？
Texts.Eng: Where's a toolbox when you need one?!

Texts.Chs: 什么肉才是世界上最美味的肉呢？
Texts.Eng: Which meat is the best meat?

Texts.Chs: 谁在那时创造了你们这群家伙？
Texts.Eng: Who created you guys, then?

Texts.Chs: “大猿人”是谁？
Texts.Eng: Who is "Big Ape"?

Texts.Chs: 那么，到底谁是我一直在听到的克鲁西斯？
Texts.Eng: Who's this Kluex I keep hearing about, then?

Texts.Chs: 哇，你真是崭新的好东西...
Texts.Eng: Whoa, you're something new alright...

Texts.Chs: 喔喔！
Texts.Eng: Whoo!

Texts.Chs: 我为什么不拿上自己的武器呢？
Texts.Eng: Why didn't I take a weapon with me?!

Texts.Chs: 哇，你真是五光十色！你去参加节日了吗？
Texts.Eng: Wow, you're pretty brightly coloured! Are you off to a festival?

Texts.Chs: 哟，叶族人。
Texts.Eng: Yo there, Floran.

Texts.Chs: 哟！
Texts.Eng: Yo!

Texts.Chs: 你们这些星之子可真帅。
Texts.Eng: You Novakids are awesome.

Texts.Chs: 一切尚好？
Texts.Eng: You alright?

Texts.Chs: 你可以修剪一下。
Texts.Eng: You could do with a pruning.

Texts.Chs: 你还好吗？
Texts.Eng: You good?

Texts.Chs: 你这家伙可真酷。
Texts.Eng: You guys are so cool.

Texts.Chs: 你有着世界上最酷的脸庞。
Texts.Eng: You have the coolest face.

Texts.Chs: 你看起来真强壮，就像一个摔跤手。
Texts.Eng: You look pretty strong, like a wrestler.

Texts.Chs: 你看起来真酷。我真希望我是你。
Texts.Eng: You look so cool. I wish I was you.

Texts.Chs: 你看起来很温暖，毛绒绒的。
Texts.Eng: You look so warm and fluffy.

Texts.Chs: 你让我想起我在地球上长大时所拥有的花园。
Texts.Eng: You make me think of the garden I had when I was growing up on Earth.

Texts.Chs: 你身上有落水狗狗的臭味！或者，我猜，是落水猿的味道。
Texts.Eng: You reek of wet dog! Or, I guess, wet ape.

Texts.Chs: 你让我想起了在海滩度假的日子。
Texts.Eng: You remind me of holidays at the beach.

Texts.Chs: 你似乎像是个有教养的人。
Texts.Eng: You seem like a cultured kind of person.

Texts.Chs: 你看起来很不错。
Texts.Eng: You seem like a nice sort.

Texts.Chs: 你肯定会成为一个恐怖的“暗夜凶杀”玩家。
Texts.Eng: You would be a terrible "murder in the dark" player.

Texts.Chs: 你有点吱吱作响，也许你该给你的关节上点油。
Texts.Eng: You're a bit creaky, maybe you should oil your joints.

Texts.Chs: 你不是从附近来的，是吧？
Texts.Eng: You're not from around here, are you?

Texts.Chs: 你是一个聪明的鱼人。
Texts.Eng: You're one slick fish man.

Texts.Chs: 作为一个会说话的金枪鱼来说，你还蛮帅的。
Texts.Eng: You're pretty awesome for a talking tuna.

Texts.Chs: 你挺可爱的。
Texts.Eng: You're pretty cute.

Texts.Chs: 作为一个杀手机器人，你相当可爱。
Texts.Eng: You're quite small for a killer robot.

Texts.Chs: 你是如此的耀眼！
Texts.Eng: You're so bright!

Texts.Chs: 你是如此的漂亮。
Texts.Eng: You're so pretty.

Texts.Chs: 你的头发可真华丽。
Texts.Eng: Your hair is just magnificent.
